channel.title: CVE Feed for LCDS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LCDS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-19002|2024-08-05T11:23:08.797Z -- lcds -- lcds%20laquis%20scada
item.description: LCDS Laquis SCADA prior to version 4.1.0.4150 allows improper control of generation of code when opening a specially crafted project file, which may allow remote code execution, data exfiltration, or cause a system crash.

item.title: CVE-2018-18986|2024-08-05T11:23:08.495Z -- lcds -- lcds%20laquis%20scada
item.description: LCDS Laquis SCADA prior to version 4.1.0.4150 allows the opening of a specially crafted report format file that may cause an out of bounds read, which may cause a system crash, allow data exfiltration, or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-19029|2024-08-05T11:23:08.951Z -- lcds -- lcds%20laquis%20scada
item.description: LCDS Laquis SCADA prior to version 4.1.0.4150 allows an attacker using a specially crafted project file to supply a pointer for a controlled memory address, which may allow remote code execution, data exfiltration, or cause a system crash.

item.title: CVE-2024-5040|2024-06-04T18:02:51.586Z -- lcds -- laquis%20scada
item.description: There are multiple ways in LCDS LAquis SCADA for an attacker to access locations outside of their own directory.

item.title: CVE-2024-5040|2024-08-01T21:03:10.607Z -- lcds -- laquis%20scada
item.description: There are multiple ways in LCDS LAquis SCADA for an attacker to access locations outside of their own directory.
